name: Cave Mystery
description:
The Cave of Death. Rumors say that those who entered it never returned. Why though? Someone has to find out!

Enter the cave, defeat enemies, loot chests, eat cookies and run away from fireballs to reach the end!

Originally made for Mini Jam 19: Mysteries, but wasn't subbmitted due to being late.

Music by EliteFerrex
EliteFerrex on Newgrounds: https://eliteferrex.newgrounds.com/
EliteFerrex on Bandcamp: https://eliteferrex.bandcamp.com
Cave - Harmonic Loop (https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/628391)
Boss - 8-bit Vengeance (https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/572129)
